eLTER getSiteGeneral function

Source: R/getSiteGeneral.R
getSiteGeneral.Rd

This function obtains general information about an eLTER site througth the DEIMS-SDR sites API.

getSiteGeneral(deimsid)

Arguments

deimsid

A `character`. The DEIMS ID of the site from DEIMS-SDR website. More information about DEIMS ID from: page.

Value

The output of the function is a `tibble` with main features of the site and the general information, such as: abstract, keywords, purpose, status, yearEstablished, yearClosed, hierarchy, siteName, short name, site type, protection level, images.

Author

Alessandro Oggioni, phD (2020) oggioni.a@irea.cnr.it

Examples

tSiteGeneral <- getSiteGeneral(
  deimsid = "https://deims.org/17210eba-d832-4759-89fa-9ff127cbdf6e"
)

#>
